challenges.name: Sort Array Ascending
challenges.description: Given n and an array, sort elements in non-decreasing order and print them.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.name: Second Largest Element
challenges.description: Print second largest distinct element in the array. If it does not exist (all equal), print -1.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.name: Count Distinct Elements
challenges.description: Given an array, count number of distinct values.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.
challenges.output_format: Single integer: count of distinct values.

challenges.name: Matrix Row Sum
challenges.description: Given matrix of size n x m, print sum of each row on separate line.
challenges.input_format: First line: n m. Next n lines: m integers each.
challenges.output_format: n lines, ith line is sum of ith row.

challenges.name: Matrix Transpose
challenges.description: Given matrix n x m, print its transpose (m x n).
challenges.input_format: First line: n m. Next n lines: m integers.
challenges.output_format: Transpose: m lines, each with n integers.

challenges.name: Pair with Given Sum (Exists?)
challenges.description: Given array and value S, determine if there exists a pair (i, j) with ai + aj = S (i != j). Print YES or NO.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers. Third line: S.
challenges.notes: Use two-pointer after sorting or HashSet.

challenges.name: Rotate Array by K
challenges.description: Right-rotate array by k positions and print result.
challenges.input_format: First line: n k. Second line: n integers.

challenges.name: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
challenges.description: Given two sorted arrays, merge them into a single sorted array.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers sorted. Third line: m. Fourth line: m integers sorted.
challenges.output_format: Merged sorted array in one line.

challenges.name: Longest Non-Negative Segment
challenges.description: Given an array, find length of the longest contiguous segment consisting of non-negative numbers.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.name: Frequency of Each Element
challenges.description: Given n and n integers, print each distinct value and its frequency sorted by value ascending.
challenges.input_format: First line: n. Second line: n integers.
challenges.output_format: For each distinct value v, print: v freq, in separate lines, sorted by v.
